Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at 76th/Dobson
ShortDescription: 75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Cottage Grove, 79th, Greenwood & 75th, due to fire department activity near 76th/Dobson

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Cottage Grove, 79th, Greenwood, then resume their normal route on 75th, due to fire department activity near 76th/Dobson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Major

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
